channel.title: Blankscape problems
channel.description: Just finished downloading blankscape. Runs fine, but when i try to log in I get a message that says, error connecting to the server. I tried doing this multiple times and every time I get the same message. No idea what to do. Please help.

item.title: Blankscape problems
item.dc:creator: @slayer_will slayer will
item.description:
@slayer_will wrote:

ok just tried it and i still get the message saying error connecting to server. Really confused and dont understand why this isnt working.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Dustinss Dustinss
item.description:
@Dustinss wrote:

should just be in your servers folder, Search for client.
I also am having this problem. I’ve been trying all day, I changed all my ports, my ip’s everything, cant get it to work.

I would see it to be easiest if someone could just help on teamviewer.

Read full topic

item.description:
@slayer_will wrote:

I’m really sry about all this. I just started using this today. Can you tell me where the client.java is because I cant find it

item.title: Blankscape problems
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

slayer will:

ok so i tried it again using both the ips u said and I still get that message. Nothing appears in the run box ssoooo, what should I do to fix that?

Make sure the port the client is connecting to is the port the server is running on
Client sided: Search for these in client.java 43594 or 43595 and 5555 sometimes server owners put different ports

Server sided find server.ini and it should say somthing like PORT and a number make sure the client and server ones match up

Read full topic

item.title: Blankscape problems
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

If it’s hosted on your computer then you need to be connecting to localhost, 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0. You also might want to read,

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

The message means it cannot connect to the server, if nothing appears on the run box then you’re not reaching the server (Not connecting to the connect ip, ports blocked etc…) if it is showing something on the run box then the server seems to be rejecting your connection.

Read full topic
